Qualifiers.scope: Porches and entry features for building facades (typology)
Qualifiers.applicability: General classification of porch/entry feature types as depicted in Figure 4
Qualifiers.description: Figure 4 enumerates the recognized types of porches and entry features.
ambiguities: Figure-based enumeration does not explicitly state whether this list is exhaustive.
No definitions are provided for 'roofed', 'entry way', 'porch', or 'vaulted'.

Variables.name: feature_type
Variables.description: Type classification of the porch/entry feature per Figure 4.

Conditions.description: feature_type must be one of the enumerated types shown in Figure 4.
Conditions.logic: feature_type ∈ {'roofed porch','roofed entry way (not vaulted)','vaulted entry way','combination porch & vaulted entry way'}

hierarchical.title: Types of porches and entry ways

cross_references.subject: How to measure height of porches & entry features

Qualifiers.scope: Roofed entry ways that are not vaulted
Qualifiers.applicability: Entry features categorized as 'roofed entry way (not vaulted)' per Figure 4
Qualifiers.exclusions: Vaulted entry ways; combination porch & vaulted entry way
Qualifiers.description: Non-vaulted roofed entry way height constraint relative to grade.
ambiguities: Boundary condition at exactly 12 ft is not specified (whether 12.0 ft is classified as not vaulted or vaulted).
Method of determining 'grade' and vertical measurement datum is referenced in other figures, not provided here.

Variables.name: height_above_grade
Variables.description: Vertical height of the roofed entry way measured above grade (see referenced figures for method).

Constants.name: vault_threshold_height
Constants.spec: Right-side note: Height less than 12' above grade

Conditions.description: A roofed entry way (not vaulted) must have height less than 12 ft above grade.
Conditions.logic: IF feature_type == 'roofed entry way (not vaulted)' THEN height_above_grade < 12 ft

cross_references.subject: How to measure height of porches & entry features

logical_dependencies: Depends on accurate measurement of height_above_grade per referenced procedure.

Qualifiers.applicability: Entry features categorized as 'vaulted entry way' per Figure 4
Qualifiers.exclusions: Roofed entry way (not vaulted); roofed porch
Qualifiers.description: Vaulted entry way height condition relative to grade.
ambiguities: Boundary condition at exactly 12 ft is not specified.
No explicit definition of 'vaulted' beyond the height note on this page.

Variables.name: height_above_grade
Variables.description: Vertical height of the vaulted entry way above grade.

Constants.name: vault_threshold_height
Constants.spec: Right-side note: Height greater than 12' above grade

Conditions.description: A vaulted entry way must have height greater than 12 ft above grade.
Conditions.logic: IF feature_type == 'vaulted entry way' THEN height_above_grade > 12 ft

cross_references.subject: How to measure height of porches & entry features

logical_dependencies: Depends on accurate measurement of height_above_grade per referenced procedure.

Qualifiers.scope: Combination porch and vaulted entry way
Qualifiers.applicability: Features that combine a porch and a vaulted entry way per Figure 4
Qualifiers.exclusions: Standalone roofed porch; standalone non-vaulted roofed entry way
Qualifiers.description: Combination feature height condition relative to grade.
ambiguities: Boundary condition at exactly 12 ft is not specified.
The required characteristics of the 'porch' component are not detailed on this page.

Variables.name: height_above_grade
Variables.description: Vertical height of the combination feature's entry component above grade.

Constants.name: vault_threshold_height
Constants.spec: Right-side note: Height greater than 12' above grade

Conditions.description: A combination porch & vaulted entry way must have height greater than 12 ft above grade.
Conditions.logic: IF feature_type == 'combination porch & vaulted entry way' THEN height_above_grade > 12 ft

cross_references.subject: How to measure height of porches & entry features

logical_dependencies: Depends on accurate measurement of height_above_grade per referenced procedure.
Composite relationship: composed_of {'roofed porch','vaulted entry way'}.
